Milwaukee.SS Appomattox:
SS Appomattox was an American bulk cargo steamship and one of the largest wooden ships ever built.


== History ==
Appomattox had a length of 319 feet (97.2 m) and a beam of 42 feet (12.8 m). She was built in 1896 by James Davidson of West Bay City, Michigan, and was fitted with a triple expansion steam engine.
